item.title: Migrating disks from GP2 to GP3
item.description: Migrating from GP2 disks to GP3 to Save Money on Your AWSÂ Bill GP3 disks were announced back in December 2020 as a new and improved standard disk which promised the potential of 20% savings over the GP2 disks. Despite this, I rarely see a customer who’s migrated their disks from GP2 to GP3, so here is a blog post that should get you started and on your way. Why GP3?
